document.full_text: an investigation by the gavi global vaccine alliance has found that $563,000 was misused in two of its cash-based projects in mali, and malian authorities have agreed to pay it back, the alliance said thursday.
document.title: mali to repay misused vaccine funds, arrests 4: gavi
lines_and_colors: an investigation by the gavi global vaccine alliance has found that $563,000 was misused in two of its cash-based projects in mali, and malian authorities have agreed to pay it back, the alliance said thursday.
